design_principles: Clean, playful yet financially responsible aesthetic
Retro-inspired wallet cards and cash counter widgets
Soft pastel color palette with Philippine flag accent colors

icons.style: Rounded, friendly outline icons with occasional filled versions

wallet_cards.style: Credit card-inspired rounded rectangles with bank branding

budget_folders.design: Manila folder aesthetic with peso amounts as labels
budget_folders.usage: Monthly budgets, savings goals, expense categories
budget_folders.colors: Pastel variants of bank brand colors

money_counter.design: Digital green text on dark background
money_counter.usage: Total balance, monthly spending, savings progress

transaction_feed.style: Social media feed aesthetic for financial activity
transaction_feed.design: Cards with soft shadows, categorized by income/expense colors

savings_jars.design: Cute piggy bank or jar illustrations with progress bars
savings_jars.usage: Emergency fund, vacation fund, gadget fund
savings_jars.animations: Coins dropping in, progress filling up

ai_assistant.style: Friendly Filipino mascot (e.g., cute carabao or jeepney)
ai_assistant.usage: Budget tips, spending insights, financial advice

expense_tracker.daily_view: Instagram story-style vertical cards for daily expenses

buttons.primary: Bold rounded buttons with peso sign icons
buttons.add_money: Green gradient with '+' and peso symbol
buttons.spend: Red gradient with '-' and peso symbol

bottom_nav.style: Floating pill design with active state highlighting

dashboard.hero_section: Total balance display with all wallets summary

wallets_screen.layout: Vertical stack of wallet cards with add new wallet option
wallets_screen.each_card: Bank logo, account name, current balance, quick actions

transactions_screen.transaction_cards: Feed-style with category icons and colored amounts
transactions_screen.search: Top search bar with peso amount and category filters

analytics_screen.ai_insights: Card with mascot giving personalized advice

ai_chat.style: Messenger-like interface with budget-focused quick replies
suggestions: How much can I spend today?

animations.money_transitions: Numbers counting up/down with satisfying easing
animations.wallet_interactions: Cards slightly lifting on tap with shadow increase
animations.category_selection: Bouncy icon selections with color transitions
animations.success_states: Confetti for goals reached, checkmark animations for completed transactions

personality.tone: Friendly, encouraging Filipino millennial/Gen-Z financial buddy
personality.copy_style: Mix of English and Tagalog, use of 'tara', 'uy', 'ang galing!'
personality.achievement_language: Congratulatory Filipino expressions for financial wins
